main.name: Shashi Kumar Mishra
main.description: like to play in frontend technologies, I have been a part of many Engineering Transformation Journeys for many multi national clients like Lloyds Banking Group, Bunnings, Diageo and H&M which helped me to understand the actual impact of technology in businesses. I like to contribute in opensource community, write articles, run sessions, Technical Meetups and Conferences
main.bio: Hello I am Krishank I have 6+ years of working Experience as a Javascript Full Stack Developer where I have worked in various technologies in different area and domain like Frontend (React, Redux, Jest and Enzyme), Mobile (IONIC), CMS(Drupal, AEM, WordPress, Site core), Backend (Node, Moca, Chai, Sinnon, REST APIs, API Gateways, IBM API Connect, Azure Gateway, API Sceurity) and Devops(Jenkins, UCD, CI/CD, IBM Bluemix, Azure)  My Primary Skill is JavaScript and I am working in both Frontend and Backend from last 3 years. I worked for an End to End API Building platform in which we developed and exposed more then 200 APIs this helped me to understand the In and Out of the whole Architecture and the importance of scalabilty.
main.contactmessage: I am always open for new challenges shoot a mail if you have something which will not allow me to say NO

resume.skillmessage: Bachelors in computer science and engineering 6+ year of working experience in software development mainly focused helping clients in there Engineering Transformation Journeys, REST APIs Node and React based full stack Developer.

education.degree: Bachelors in computer science and engineering

work.title: Senior Frontend Developer
work.description: Wokring as a Senior Frontend Developer for Bunnings (third largest website in Australia) mainly work on React, Redux, storybook, DSL, BEM, SASS, API Gateway, jest and enzyme, here we are doidng component based development and migrating a JQuery and hbs based large legacy system to react here I have learned about the importance of Design Specific Language(DSL) to make sure the consistency of Design and maintainability of application

work.title: Team Lead Senior Associate Experience Technology L2
work.description: Worked as a Team Lead for Lloyds Banking Group API Platform my work was divided into 70% coading(React, Node) and 30 team lead activites which involve preparing new praposals for our clients, backlog refienment, connecting with product owner on regualr basis, resolving inter team dependencies and running multple sessions. The project was based on Node, React, Redux, IBM API Connect, REST, API Sceurity (OAuth, OIDC, JWE, JWS,JWT, JOSE, API Key), Moca, Chai, Sinnon, IBM Bluemnmix, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, UCD

work.title: Senior Associate Experience Technology L2
work.description: Worked as a Full Stack Developer for Lloyds Banking Group PSD2 Open Banking Program where I was mainly responsible for development using Node, React, Redux, IBM API Connect, REST, API Sceurity (OAuth, OIDC, JWE, JWS,JWT, JOSE, API Key), Moca, Chai, Sinnon etc. here I started contributing in praposel of solution and also learned and worked on Drupal for about a two months because of Project Need (https://developer.lloydsbanking.com)

work.title: Senior Associate Experience Technology L1
work.description: Worked as a Full Stack Developer for Lloyds Banking Group PSD2 Open Banking Program worked on Node, React, Redux, IBM API Connect, REST, API Sceurity (OAuth, OIDC, JWE, JWS,JWT, JOSE, API Key), Moca, Chai, Sinnon this was my first project where I have started working on REST APIs, Node, API Gateways and API Sceurity so I learned a lot here

work.title: Sr Associate Experience Technology L1
work.description: Worked as a Mobile App Developer for NedBank we have used technologies like Ionic, mocha chai and sinon In this project I learned about Mobile App development

work.title: Associate Experience Technology L2
work.description: Worked as a Frontend Developer for Diageo platform and H&M. Diageo platform team was responsible to develop reusable components which other team can reuse mainly worked on Jquery, Pubsub, Handlebar and backbone the backed was in AEM. Here I learned about multi tenant and multi lingual application and H&M  was based on Jquery, Pubsub, Handlebar and backed was in AEM here I learned application personalisation

work.title: Sr. Frontend Engineer
work.description: Developed FirstNaukri.com mobile site and proposed multiple best practices and tools like SASS, Grunt, Jasmin, Zepto, Requirejs, Mobile First Approach yes its not new now but backin 2013 it was

work.title: Frontend Engineer
work.description: Joined as a Frontend Engineer and started working on naukrigulf.com Developed a Form building Library so our clients can create multiple forms without writing any html, here I worked intensively on OOJS

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Krishank must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
